One World.                       Share Your Content                       Our Team                       Internships                       Our Goals                                                                   Introduce Yourself       Here is your chance to make a first impression. Enter the One Word. One World. photo and video contest and introduce yourself to classmates before arriving on campus! The contest is open to all incoming freshmen and transfer students — whether you are starting in New York, Abu Dhabi, Paris, London, Shanghai, Florence, or Washington DC.   #OWOW2015 will start on July 1st, 2015 — stay tuned!                                                                                              STEP ONE   Choose  One Word              Choose one word that describes you, then take a photo or make a short video — no longer than 30 seconds! — that shows who you are in one word.   Tip: Take a look at last year's finalists if you need inspiration.   Learn about entries »           STEP TWO   Submit  Your Entry               Submit your photo or video by July 31st using the "One Word. One World." app on HashtagNYU's Facebook page. Incoming students will need a Facebook account and may only submit one entry, so make sure it's final before you submit!   Tip: Submit early for maximum exposure.   Learn about deadlines »             STEP THREE   Vote  for Finalists               Vote for your favorites starting July 1st and help us decide who should be a finalist. You can vote once per entry per day, so come back often!   Tip: Anyone can vote... Encourage friends, family, and frenemies to vote for your entry.   Learn about voting »             STEP FOUR   Explore  the Winners               Winners chosen by our panel of judges are revealed on the big screen during the Presidential Welcome — imagine that on one of your very first days of school...   Learn about finalists »                                                                                       NYU Footer          Search      Directory      Campus Map      Events      Contact Us      Site Map      Copyright and Fair Use      Feedback         Unless otherwise noted, all content copyright New York University. All rights reserved. Designed by The Office of Web Communications                                                                           UA-42083626-1

WORD: Tisch School of the Arts at NYU                           Skip to content          < back        WORD  Event Date and Time: March 28, 2013 – April 6, 2013 Location: Frederick Loewe Theatre 721 Broadway, 2nd Floor New York, NY 10003 Event Times:   Thursday, Mar. 28th at 8:00pm Friday, Mar. 29th at 8:00pm Saturday, Mar. 30th at 8:00pm Sunday, Mar. 31st at 7:00pm Tuesday, Apr. 2nd at 8:00pm Wednesday, Apr. 3rd at 8:00pm Thursday, Apr. 4th at 8:00pm Friday, Apr. 5th at 8:00pm Saturday, Apr. 6th at 2:00pm   Artistic Producer: Katie Bull Vocal Directors: Katie Bull John VanWyden Marika Becz Dawn-Elin Fraser Tisch Drama StageWorks’ presentation of short works of vocal and spoken-word performances, derived from different techniques taught in the Department. This production brings together dozens of students, across the department’s professional training studios, to collaborate and create original works under the direction of faculty members specializing in voice and speech training.
